info.name: User API (Yondu)
info.description:
This API demonstrates a basic user management system implementing authentication, CRUD functions for a users table.

**Required Environment Variables:**

accessToken

refreshToken

userId

delUserId

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Authenticates an admin user by providing the username and password, and returns the accessToken and refreshToken used in accessing the authenticated endpoints.

**Body Params:**

username (string)

password (string)
Allows the admin to generate a new access token by sending the valid refresh token in the Authentication header.
Invalidates the session of the admin based on the provided access token in the Authentication header.

item.description: Contains the endpoints for admin login, logout, and generation of access token.

item.name: User

request.description: Get all the records of the users table.

request.description:
Get a specific user record by providing the user id.

**Path Params:**

id (number)

response.name: Get Users by Id (Valid Access Token and Existing User)

request.description:
Create a new user record.

**Body Params:**

firstname (string)

lastname (string)

address (string) \[optional\]

postcode (string) \[optional\]

phone (string) \[optional\]

email (string)

username (string)

password (string)

response.name: Create User (Valid Access Token and Complete Fields)

request.description:
Replace an existing user resource with the details sent in the body of the request.

**Path Params:**

id (number)

**Body Params:**

firstname (string)

lastname (string)

address (string) \[optional\]

postcode (string) \[optional\]

phone (string) \[optional\]

email (string)

username (string)

password (string)

response.name: Update User by Id (Valid Access Token and Complete Fields)

request.description:
Update an existing user resource with only the specific fields sent in the body of the request.

**Path Params:**

id (number)

**Body Params:**

firstname (string) \[optional\]

lastname (string) \[optional\]

address (string) \[optional\]

postcode (string) \[optional\]

phone (string) \[optional\]

email (string) \[optional\]

username (string) \[optional\]

password (string) \[optional\]

response.name: Patch User by Id (Valid Access Token and with Updates)

request.description: Delete all resources in the user table.

Delete an existing user resource by providing the user id.

**Path Params:**

id (number)

response.name: Delete User by Id (Valid Access Token and Existing User)

request.description:
Delete multiple user resources by providing an array of user ids in the body of the request.

**Body** **Params:** ids (number\[\])

**Possible Cases:**

**Case:** The ids field is an empty array

**Result:** Response has a 404 status and message: Resource not found.

**Case:** All the ids in the array are existing resources

**Result:** The specified user resources will be deleted, with a response of status 200 and message: Users were successfully deleted.

**Case:** The ids field contains both exisiting and non existing user id

**Result:** Existing user resources will be deleted, and the non existing user ids will be shown in the response with a message: Resource not found. Response has a 200 status.

**Case:** The ids field contains all non existing user id

**Result:** Response has a 404 status with the list of ids and message: Resource not found.

response.name: Delete Users by Ids (Valid Access Token and Existing Users)

item.description: Contains the endpoints for the CRUD functions of the users table.
